name: convey
description: deploy your express apps to aws without a phd

scripts.deploy:app: cd packages/cdk && npx cdk deploy ConveyApp --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:core: cd packages/cdk && npx cdk deploy ConveyCore --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:all: cd packages/cdk && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.backend:dev: concurrently --kill-others "cross-env NODE_ENV=development AWS_PROFILE=convey nodemon --exec ts-node packages/server/src/index.ts" "docker-compose up"
